analysis.description:
FollowersToken.purchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x422401a78d6fb4727f96cc435884ecf5ce16f527.sol#208-236) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/11/0x422401a78d6fb4727f96cc435884ecf5ce16f527.sol#234-235)

FollowersToken._payout (/unique_chucks/11/0x422401a78d6fb4727f96cc435884ecf5ce16f527.sol#325-329) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x422401a78d6fb4727f96cc435884ecf5ce16f527.sol#327-328)
	- _to.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x422401a78d6fb4727f96cc435884ecf5ce16f527.sol#328-329)
